Title: Prohibits private colleges from collecting financial information from a student's non-custodial parent; requires that private colleges use student financial aid formulas that are arrived at independently
Summary: Prohibits independent higher education institutions from collecting financial information from a student's or prospective student's non-custodial parent; requires that private colleges use student financial aid formulas that are arrived at independently, without coordination with outside standard setting organizations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting independent higher education institutions from collecting financial information from a student's non-custodial parent and requiring independent higher education institutions to make student aid formula determinations independently
